page.title: 15Our Farm Visit no.1.
page.content: "Ready ?"Mr Buick enquired.It was time for our visit to{Mr.J.Dunbar's {farm. Our appointment was at 9.15 a.m. but we were a little late. Mr.Dunbar and his dog welcomed us and led us into his living-room.We then explained to him that we wished him to tell us what crops he grew in his fields.He produced some{50 year {old maps}and pointed out what was grown in each field. {See Derek {Robertson's account no.4. After our interview with the farmer we had our photographs taken by Mr.D Phillips,of the Blairgowrie Advertiser This was taken beside{Hereford}calves in the barn.Then we spent about ten minutes trying to get another photo beside two pet orphan lambs. Ruth Kellie Primary 6.
